metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1056 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds heap buffer read flaw was found in the way advancecomp before 2.1-2018/02 handled processing of ZIP files. An attacker could potentially use this flaw to crash the advzip utility by tricking it into processing crafted ZIP files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1056` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

advancecomp - 1.20-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: ratliff> w/o ASAN errors out on trusty, segfaults on xenial

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.20-1ubuntu0.1').
